title: Keir Starmer – 2022 Comments on Conservative Party Conference
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on Twitter on 5 October 2022.
content:
People across Britain are worried about rising bills, rising mortgages, rising costs.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

Yet the Tories still refuse to abandon their kamikaze budget that crashed the economy.
